analytic.title: Reformation from Within: The Reception of Luther in the Church of the East in 19th-Century Iran

monogr.title: Symposium Syriacum XII: Held at St Lawrence College, Rome 19–21 August 2016. Organized by the Pontifical Oriental Institute on the Occasion of the Centenary Celebration (1917–2017)

body.bibl: Tamcke, Martin. “Reformation from Within: The Reception of Luther in the Church of the East in 19th-Century Iran.” In Symposium Syriacum XII: Held at St Lawrence College, Rome 19–21 August 2016. Organized by the Pontifical Oriental Institute on the Occasion of the Centenary Celebration (1917–2017), edited by Emidio Vergani and Sabino Chialà, 53–64. Orientalia Christiana Analecta 311. Roma: Pontificio Istituto Orientale, 2022.

Martin Tamcke, Reformation from Within: The Reception of Luther in the Church of the East in 19th-Century Iran, in Symposium Syriacum XII: Held at St Lawrence College, Rome 19–21 August 2016. Organized by the Pontifical Oriental Institute on the Occasion of the Centenary Celebration (1917–2017), ed. Emidio Vergani and Sabino Chialà, Orientalia Christiana Analecta 311 (Roma: Pontificio Istituto Orientale, 2022), 53–64.
